body:
FWIW, a nicer solution to this is possible with the use of [cmux](https://github.com/soheilhy/cmux). See https://github.com/tamird/cockroach/commit/a513df1b1d88e16da8bc01d8b4411eedcb107768#diff-4bf1ae5b9eb22814a15582886403053f for my implementation in CockroachDB where it's used to implement h2c.

The solution referred to in grpc/grpc-go#555 (manually spoofing the host header) is more trouble than it's worth, in my opinion.
